predicate.note: Probably most eventive usages will be housesitting - not housesit.

roleset.name: to take care of someone's house
roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01. Loose comparison to verb entry babysit.01. No VN, FN.

example.name: probably the only instance -- LVC
example.text: [My parents]-3 have chosen PRO-3 to do this housesit, I really don't mind but I'm not sure I want to go over, walk the dog and sit in a stranger's house for a couple of hours to pass the time.
